text:
Hey Amber! So sorry for the delayed reply!!! I'm good thanks! Been rather busy with work haha, How are you?? Oh wow that sounds great! Where have you been to?
Ahh cool which ones!! And which one? Was it the Manchester Animation Festival? And definitely!
Are you back on the job scout or taking some time? Feel like it gonna potentially start to get busy in the new year so there may be lots of roles coming up!
